# cmccloudv2_keymanagement_token (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_keymanagement_token" "token1" {
    container_ids = "11137b6a-1180-4a88-8a72-fba9b103e9b6"
    description   = "token for dev"
    expiration    = "2026-06-11T16:05:06.277Z"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `container_ids` (List of String) The IDs of the key management containers

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the key management token
- `expiration` (String) The expiration time of the key management token, example: `2026-06-11T16:05:06.277Z`
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The created time of the key management token
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `token` (String) The token of the key management token

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `update` (String)
